name: S-adenosyl-L-methionine:malonyl-[acyl-carrier protein] O-methyltransferase
definition: S-Adenosyl-L-methionine + Malonyl-[acyl-carrier protein] <=> S-Adenosyl-L-homocysteine + Malonyl-[acp] methyl ester
comment: Malonyl-[acp] is a far better acceptor of methyl groups from S-adenosyl-L-methionine than was malonyl-CoA.
